units.name: Burning Blitzer
units.effect:
Quickness, Destroyer
This card cannot attack unless you've attacked with at least two units this turn.

units.name: Ashborn Conjurer
units.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a spell or uses an activated ability - You may put into play a Fire Elemental token (Unit * Elemental/Fire/1000) with "Ruined: Deal 500 to target unit."

units.name: Ashborn Shaman
units.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a spell or uses an activated ability - You may search your deck for a Fire spell with cost (1) or less and add it to your hand.

units.name: Expanding Elemental
units.effect: Arrive - You may Shard Drain 1: If you do, search your deck for an "Expanding Elemental" and put it into play.

units.name: Maiden of Leviathan
units.effect: Arrive - You may flip one of your towers face-up. Then if you have two or more face-up towers, draw a card.

units.name: Isa, the Cloudmender
units.effect: Ruined - You may equip this card to target unit you control (While equipped to another unit, treat this card as an augment, not a unit). If a unit equipped with this card would be destroyed, you may remove all damage from that unit, and destroy this card instead.

units.name: Grove Elemental
units.effect:
Arrive - If you've played at least two other cards this turn, put the top card of your shard deck into play.
Whenever this card leaves the field - Your opponent may destroy one of your shards.

units.name: Commander of Light
units.effect: Exhaust: Recover all units adjacent to this card. They cannot deal damage until the end of the turn.

units.name: Vi, Matron of Miracles
units.effect: Expel any number of Gear from your discard zone: Target unit you control with cost (X) or less cannot be targeted by spells or abilities this turn. If it's exhausted, recover it. (X equals the total cost of Gear you expelled.)

units.name: Deathwhisperer
units.effect: Arrive - You may sacrifice a unit you control with Ruined. If you do, its Ruined ability triggers twice.

units.name: Jacobi, the Vampire King
units.effect: Sacrifice this card: Put target unit from your opponent's discard zone that was put there from the field this turn into play under your control.
units.special: This card is based on AS player Jacobi Schreiter!

units.name: Shadow Liger
units.effect: Whenever this card attacks or is attacked - Send the top two cards of your deck to the discard zone.

units.name: Battle Angel of Dominion
units.effect: Arrive - You may reveal an Argent unit from your hand: If you do, destroy target unit.

units.name: Lloyd, Cosmic Enigma
units.effect:
Arrive - Choose an element, and choose one of the following.
* This card cannot be targeted by spells or abilities of the declared element.
* Ignore the effects of all towers with the declared element as long as this card is on the field.

units.name: Shard Spider
units.effect:
If you have more destroyed towers than your opponent, and they control more units than you, this card cost (3) less to play.
Arrive - Exhaust target unit your opponent controls. It does not recover during your opponent's next charge phase.

units.name: Yurei, Dire Wolf of the Garden
units.effect:
Brawler
Arrive - If you destroyed an opponent's tower this turn, search your deck or discard zone for "True King's Greatsword" and equip it to this card.

units.name: Ceremonial Harpist
units.effect:
Guardian
This card cannot deal damage, and cannot be targeted by spells.
Ruined – Search your deck for a "Hallowed Harpist" and put it into play.

units.name: Dux, the Infamous Skyraider
units.effect:
Airship and Skyraider units cost you (1) less to play.
Arrive - Add target Airship or Skyraider unit from your discard zone to your hand.

units.name: Giga-Shardbeast
units.effect:
You can only play units.
Other "Shardbeast" units you control get +500.

units.name: Gigath, the King of the Gargoyles
units.effect:
This card costs (2) less to play for each card in your hand that exceeds the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, neither player can add to the queue in response to playing this card.
Other units you control gain Immortal during your turn.

units.name: Linda & Goblin, Dynamic Duo
units.effect:
Brawler
While you control a Beast unit, you may play this card from your discard zone as if it was in your hand.
Arrive – Put into play a Cat token (Unit/Beast/Light/1000) that has "Cannot be targeted by spells or abilities.".

units.name: Sandsea Hydra Scorpion
units.effect: Ruined – Search your deck for a Beast unit with cost (1) or less and put it into play.

units.name: Unrestrained Poltergeist
units.effect: Ruined – Send the top three cards of a player's deck to the discard zone, then a different player expels the top three cards of their deck.

spells.name: Ready for War
spells.effect:
Instacast
Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put into play as many revealed Fire units as possible with cost (3) or less. Send the rest to the discard zone.

spells.name: Ariana's Resolve
spells.effect:
Choose one. If your champion has "Ariana" in its name, you may choose both.
* Search your deck for an "Ariana" or "AIRA" unit and add it to your hand.
* Put target "Kala" unit and/or "Ariana's Amulet" from your discard zone into play.

spells.name: Tempest Punch
spells.effect:
Instacast
Target attacking unit you control gets +2000, and return it to its owner's hand at the end of the turn. If your champion has "Ariana" in its name, that unit also cannot be targeted by your opponent's spells or abilities this turn.

spells.name: Dance of Blades
spells.effect: Instacast Deal 500 to target unit. If this destroys the unit, put a Knight token (Unit * Knight/Light/1500) into play.

augments.name: True King's Greatsword
augments.effect:
Equip to target unit. The equipped unit gets +500. Whenever the equipped card destroys a unit in battle - Place two counters on this card.
Remove a counter from this card: Deal 1000 to target unit.
Remove two counters from this card: Deal 1000 to target face-up tower.
